summary: Released from prison, a gangster (Michitaro Mizushima) retrieves diamonds sought by fellow yakuza.
cast: Michitarô Mizushima|Mari Shiraki|Shinsuke Ashida|Tôru Abe|Hideaki Nitani|Setsuko Amamiya|Tomio Aoki|Shôki Fukae|Ayako Fukuda|Akinori Hanamura|Kyôko Horikawa|Ryûsei Itô|Bumon Kahara|Hiroshi Katô|Ichiro Kijima|Hiroshi Kondô|Jun Miyazaki|Kyôichi Mizuki|Reiko Sakuma|Eiko Takada|Seijirô Takano|Kaku Takashina|Chigusa Takayama|Keisuke Yukioka|Fumisuke Ômi
title: Ankokugai no bijo
